article_text: Over the next five years, more objects will be connected to the Internet and will not only transact but also negotiate with businesses and people. This will redefine what competitive advantage means and present new challenges for CIOs, writes Guest Contributor and Gartner Analyst Jorge Lopez in the first of a series of stories on digital business.

article_summary:
This will redefine what competitive advantage means and present new challenges for CIOs, writes Guest Contributor and Gartner Analyst Jorge Lopez in the first of a series of stories on digital business.
Over the next five years, more objects will be connected to the Internet and will not only transact but also negotiate with businesses and people.
